chapter.title: SonicWALL

To escape to local shell, press 'Ctrl+Alt+]'.

chapter.para: 输入help帮助，使用tab键或者“？”可以提示参数。

section.title: show 命令
section.screen: NSA 240> show status Model: NSA 240 Product Code: 6931 Firewall Serial Number: 0017C565A5FE Authentication Code: V3F4-ACU4 Number of IP addresses allowed with this license: Unlimited System Time: 11/27/2012 21:08:27 Up Time: 0 Days 23:07:27 Firmware Version: SonicOS Enhanced 5.8.1.0-30o Safemode Version: Safemode 5.0.1.13 ROM Version: SonicROM 5.0.2.12 Interfaces: Interface X0, name X0, zone LAN, ipaddr 192.168.100.1, 100 Mbps full-duplex Interface X1, name X1, zone Unassigned, ipaddr 0.0.0.0, No link Interface X2, name X2, zone Unassigned, ipaddr 0.0.0.0, No link Interface X3, name X3, zone WAN, ipaddr 116.204.103.163, 100 Mbps full-duplex Interface X4, name X4, zone LAN, ipaddr 192.168.200.1, 100 Mbps full-duplex Interface X5, name X5, zone Unassigned, ipaddr 0.0.0.0, No link Interface X6, name X6, zone Unassigned, ipaddr 0.0.0.0, No link Interface X7, name X7, zone Unassigned, ipaddr 0.0.0.0, No link Interface X8, name X8, zone LAN, ipaddr 192.168.1.1, 100 Mbps full-duplex Interface M0, name M0, zone Unassigned, ipaddr 0.0.0.0, No link Interface U0, name U0, zone Unassigned, ipaddr 0.0.0.0, No link Interface U1, name U1, zone Unassigned, ipaddr 0.0.0.0, No link CPUs: 2 x 500 MHz Mips64 Octeon Processor Total Memory: 256 MB RAM, 32 MB Flash This firewall is not yet registered.

section.title: 配置文件的导入与导出
monitor 监控命令
section.screen:
NSA 240> monitor show status
Model: NSA 240 Product Code: 6931 Firewall Serial Number: 0017C565A5FE Authentication Code: V3F4-ACU4 Number of IP addresses allowed with this license: Unlimited System Time: 11/27/2012 21:10:15 Up Time: 0 Days 23:09:16 Firmware Version: SonicOS Enhanced 5.8.1.0-30o Safemode Version: Safemode 5.0.1.13 ROM Version: SonicROM 5.0.2.12 Interfaces: Interface X0, name X0, zone LAN, ipaddr 192.168.100.1, 100 Mbps full-duplex Interface X1, name X1, zone Unassigned, ipaddr 0.0.0.0, No link Interface X2, name X2, zone Unassigned, ipaddr 0.0.0.0, No link Interface X3, name X3, zone WAN, ipaddr 116.204.103.163, 100 Mbps full-duplex Interface X4, name X4, zone LAN, ipaddr 192.168.200.1, 100 Mbps full-duplex Interface X5, name X5, zone Unassigned, ipaddr 0.0.0.0, No link Interface X6, name X6, zone Unassigned, ipaddr 0.0.0.0, No link Interface X7, name X7, zone Unassigned, ipaddr 0.0.0.0, No link Interface X8, name X8, zone LAN, ipaddr 192.168.1.1, 100 Mbps full-duplex Interface M0, name M0, zone Unassigned, ipaddr 0.0.0.0, No link Interface U0, name U0, zone Unassigned, ipaddr 0.0.0.0, No link Interface U1, name U1, zone Unassigned, ipaddr 0.0.0.0, No link CPUs: 2 x 500 MHz Mips64 Octeon Processor Total Memory: 256 MB RAM, 32 MB Flash This firewall is not yet registered.
